page.title: 12FEATS OF CIVIL ENGINEERING
page.content: ROADE RAILWAY CUTTING WAS HAND DUG BY RAILWAY NAVVIES AND QUITE A FEW LOST THEIR LIVES IN DIGGING THIS CUTTING.THE CUTTING IS ONE AND A HALF MILES LONG AND WAS 65 FEET AT THE DEEPEST POINT, IT WAS OPENED IN 1838. ( BY CLARE MARTIN AGE 10 ) -------------------------------------- THE BLISWORTH TUNNEL IS ON THE GRAND UNION CANAL,WHICH JOINS LONDON TO THE WEST MIDLANDS. IT IS ABOUT THREE KILOMETRES LONG AND GOES FROM STOKE BRUERNE TO BLISWORTH. A COUPLE OF YEARS AGO IT HAD TO BE MENDED BECAUSE IT WAS UNSAFE AND DANGEROUS .IT TOOK ABOUT 2 YEARS TO MEND AND COST OVER 1 MILLION POUNDS. (BY EMMA HOPKINS AGE 10 )
